## getDataTestId() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Resolves a dataTestId value that can be either a string or a function

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getDataTestId<T = any>(dataTestId: ((rowData: T) => string) | string | undefined, rowData: T): string | undefined;
```

</td><td>

((rowData: T) =&gt; string) \| string \| undefined


</td><td>

The dataTestId value (string or function)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

rowData


</td><td>

T


</td><td>

The row data to pass to the function if dataTestId is a function


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string \| undefined

The resolved test ID string or undefined if not provided
